snippet: The Pentagon may have to come up with as much as $1 trillion in cuts if Congress follows through with deeper reductions. Make your own plan to reduce the budget.
lead_paragraph: The Pentagon may have to come up with as much as $1 trillion in cuts if Congress follows through with deeper reductions. Make your own plan to reduce the budget.

headline.main: The Future Military: Your Budget Strategy
